error._primary: You may only configure a single Exchange account.
Please restart Evolution for changes to take effect
error._secondary: Changes to options for Exchange account "{0}" will only take effect after restarting Evolution.

error._primary: The Exchange account will be removed when you quit Evolution
The Exchange account will be disabled when you quit Evolution
Cannot change password due to configuration problems.
Server rejected password because it is too weak.
error._secondary: Try again with a different password.
Cannot display folders.
Cannot access the "Exchange settings" tab in offline mode.
Cannot perform the operation.
Make sure the username and password are correct and try again.

This probably means that your server requires you to specify the Windows domain name as part of your username (eg, "DOMAIN\user").
Or you might have just typed your password wrong.

error._primary: Mailbox for {0} is not on this server.
The Exchange server is not compatible with Exchange Connector.
error._secondary: The server is running Exchange 5.5. Exchange Connector supports Microsoft Exchange 2000 and 2003 only.

error._primary: Could not find Exchange Web Storage System.
error._secondary: If OWA is running on a different path, you must specify that in the account configuration dialog.
Make sure the server name is spelled correctly and try again.
Make sure the URL is correct and try again.
Unknown error.

error._primary: You have exceeded your quota for storing mail on this server.
error._secondary: Your current usage is: {0} KB. You will not be able to either send or receive mail now.

error._primary: You are nearing your quota available for storing mail on this server.
error._secondary: Your current usage is: {0} KB. You will not be able to send mail until you clear up some space by deleting some mail.

error._primary: You are nearing your quota available for storing mail on this server.
error._secondary: Your current usage is: {0} KB. Try to clear up some space by deleting some mail.

error._primary: Could not connect to Exchange server.

error._secondary: Could not configure Exchange account because an unknown error occurred. Check the URL, username, and password, and try again.

error._primary: No Global Catalog server configured for this account.
error._secondary: Unable to edit delegates.

error._primary: Unable to add user to access control list:
error._secondary: No Global Catalog server configured for this account.
Unable to edit delegates.
Could not determine folder permissions for delegates.

error._primary: You cannot make yourself your own delegate
Please enter a Delegate's ID or deselect the Send as a Delegate option.
You are permitted to send a message on behalf of only one delegator at a time.
{0} cannot be added to an access control list
Evolution requires a restart to load the subscribed user's mailbox
Global Catalog Server is not reachable
error._secondary: Please make sure the Global Catalog Server name is correct.
